entries.journal_entry_description: Rydel Delan, master trainer in the arts of the close combat, has instructed you to destroy 3 Training Droids with your one-handed techniques.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Learn how a 1-handed weapon feels. Use your Issued Sword to destroy three training droids in the Close Combat Training Room.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Destroy 3 Training Droids in the Close Combat Training Room
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Talk to Rydel in the Close Combat Training Center now that you have completed his training task.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Return to Rydel Delan in the Close Combat Training Center
